thread.section_title: Its4women Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Its4women | www.its4women.ie
thread.title: Louise Loughlin

author: Louise Loughlin
title: Louise Loughlin
text:
Last year, I started up a policy after a long time, due to living abroad.vi got the cheapest Quote: from its4women. Now by all means, I still think that I'm paying too much, but that's an industry wide problem.
All I can review is my excellent service with its4women.mi had one mishap, where my wipers broke in the city, and my breakdown assist helped me get sorted. Then my renewal yesterday, I was kindly helped with a gentleman called Ian. I appreciate you are an online company and I had an issue with my renewal online, but you managed to help me over the phone. Thank you Ian and best wishes for a great year.
Let's hope for a cheaper renewal next year
